description: Richard Brindley's second-half header earned Eastleigh a point in an entertaining 2-2 draw against National League visitors Oldham.
title: Eastleigh 2-2 Oldham Athletic
title_page: Eastleigh 2-2 Oldham Athletic: Brindley earns point for hosts - BBC Sport
maintext:
Richard Brindley's second-half header earned Eastleigh a point in an entertaining draw against National League visitors Oldham.
The Latics were looking to bounce back from a New Year's Day reversal at Hartlepool, which was only their third league defeat of the season.
They were in the box-seat after recovering from Ludwig Francillette's 32nd-minute goal to lead midway through the second period.
Charlie Raglan hauled Oldham level after 62 minutes before Mike Fondop's header edged them ahead just three minutes later.
But Eastleigh were not done, and Luke Humphries flicked on Paul McCallum's long throw to set up Brindley and deny Oldham maximum points.
